<title>Home page</title>

This is part of a series. In this particular repository, you will find:

  *  irssi
  *  tinyfugue
  *  RPM building configuration
  *  SSH configuration
  *  GNU Privacy Guard configuration
  *  Bazaar configuration
  *  CVS configuration
  *  Git configuration
  *  Mercurial configuration
  *  tmux configuration
  *  SQLite monitor configuration

To install:

<verbatim>curl -LsSf http://chiselapp.com/user/nrr/repository/dotfiles-general/doc/trunk/move-in.sh | sh -</verbatim>

To get your own local copy over secure https, issue the following commands:
<pre>
fossil clone https://chiselapp.com/user/nrr/repository/dotfiles-general dotfiles-general.fossil
mkdir dotfiles-general && cd dotfiles-general
fossil open ../dotfiles-general.fossil
</pre>

To get your own local copy over normal http, issue the following commands:
<pre>
fossil clone http://chiselapp.com/user/nrr/repository/dotfiles-general dotfiles-general.fossil
mkdir dotfiles-general && cd dotfiles-general
fossil open ../dotfiles-general.fossil
</pre>
